title: Om shakti shaktiyenru
sahitya:
Om shakti shakti enru shollu keTTa sancalangaL yAvinaiyum kollu
anupallavi  shakti shakti enru sholli avaL sannidhiyilE tozhudu nillu
caraNam 1 Om shaktimishaip-pADal pala pADu shakti shakti enru tALam pODu
shakti tarum sheigai nilattinilE shiva shaktivenri koNDu kaLittADu

   caraNam 2  Om shaktitanayE sharaNam koLLu enrum shAvinik-korachchamillai taLLU
shakti pugazhAm-amudaiyaLLu mati tannilinip-pAghumandak-kaLLU


   caraNam 3  shakti sheyyum pudumaigaL pEshu nalla shaktiyaTra bEDigaLai Eshu
shakti tiruk-kOyiluLLamAkki avaLtandidu nark-kumkumattai pUshu

   caraNam 4  shaktiyinai shErnadinda sheigai idai shArndu nirpadE namakkOuygai
shaktiyenum inbamuLLa poighai adil taNNamudamAri nittam peighai

   caraNam 5   Om shakti shaktiyenru nATTu shiva shaktiyaruL bhUmitanil kATTu
shakti peTra nalla nilai nirppEr bhuvi jAtigaLellAmm adanaik-kETTu

   caraNam 6  shakti shaktiyenru muzhangu avaL tantaramellAm ulagil vazhangu
shaktiyaruL kUDi viDumAyin uyir santatamum vAzhudalla kizhakku

   caraNam 7  shaktiyum tozhilgaLaiyeNNu nattam shaktiyuLLa tozhil pala paNNu
shakti tanaiye izhandu viTTAl ingu shAvinaiyum nOvinaiyum uNNu

   caraNam 8  shaktiyuaruLAlulagi vEru oru sankaTam vandAl iraNDu kUru
shakti shila shOdanaigaL sheidAl avaL taNNaruLEnra manadu tEru

   caraNam 9  shakti tuNaiyenru nambi vAzhttu shiva shakti tanaiyE aghatti vAzhttu
shaktiyum shirauumighap-peruvAi shiva shaktiyaruL vAzhgavenru vAzhttu
